title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - When calling ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet, ServletContext ctx), the output is 'MySomeClass' instead of 'MySomeAnn'.
OB: When calling the method onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet, ServletContext ctx) of the ModuleInitializer class that implements ServletContainerInitializer interface, the output is 'MySomeAnn'.
EB: When calling the method onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet, ServletContext ctx) of the ModuleInitializer class that implements ServletContainerInitializer interface, the expected output should be 'MySomeAnn'.
